Entry Value (cash in): Token A Entry Value + Token B Entry Value
IL: Estimated permanent loss in % compared to holding token A and B in a 50/50 split for the same length as a CLM position where I enter at 50/50 for each token.
Transaction Fees: Actual fees paid for all transactions (trading tokens, entering a CLM position, claimed yield, close position, etc - all combined as % of entry value
Slippage: The actual % of slippage for all token conversions: swapping the tokens and then swapping the pair for a CLM token, etc. - combined as a % of entry value.
Net Return: Time-adjusted annual APR for both price and yield return components based on entry value in $CAD
